00017 
00018 #include <Auxiliary/WString.hpp>
00019 #include <Auxiliary/PhoneNumber.hpp>
00020 #include <Auxiliary/DataItem.hpp>
00021 
00022 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023     UsimPbAddData
00024     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00025 // allow hold various number of data items of the sam type. The behaviour is 
00026 // controlled by the number of entries and columns. A pointer array with 
00027 // entries*columns is always allocated, this array is type checked with the parameter
00028 // DataType. If misused, assertions are thrown. This container class is used
00029 // for SNE, ANR, EMAIL entries.
00030 
00031 class UsimPbAddData
00032 {
00033     // a union which can be either a pointer to a wstring or a phonenumber object
00034     struct UsimPbAddDataItem 
00035     {
00036         union {
00037             PhoneNumber * m_phno;
00038             WString * m_wstr;
00039         } m_val;
00040     };
00041 
00042     public:
00043         UsimPbAddData();
00044         ~UsimPbAddData(); // destructor not virtual !!!
00045 
00046         // creates a dynamically array which contain pointers to objects of DataType
00047         BOOLEAN Init(UINT entries, UINT columns, DataType type);
00048 
00049         // get the WString if existing, otherwise an empty WString object
00050         const WString & GetWString(UINT idx, UINT column) const;
00051         // set the WString object, if it is empty, then object which was pointed to is deleted 
00052         void SetWString(UINT idx, UINT column, const WString & wstr);
00053 
00054         // get the PhoneNumber if existing, otherwise an empty WString object
00055         const PhoneNumber & GetPhoneNumber(UINT idx, UINT column) const;
00056         // set the PhoneNumber object, if it is empty, then object which was pointed to is deleted 
00057         void SetPhoneNumber(UINT idx, UINT column, const PhoneNumber & phno);
00058 
00059         // get the recno of the item
00060         UINT8 GetRecno(UINT idx, UINT column) const;
00061         // set the recno of the item
00062         void SetRecno(UINT idx, UINT column, UINT8 recno);
00063 
00064         // returns TRUE if the object is ready for operation
00065         BOOLEAN IsReady() const { return (m_ptrs!=0); }
00066 
00067         // static empty objects which are used for returning empty objects in case ptr = 0
00068         static const WString     c_empty_wstr;
00069         static const PhoneNumber c_empty_phno;
00070 
00071     private:
00072         DataType m_type;
00073         UINT     m_entries;
00074         UINT     m_columns;
00075         UsimPbAddDataItem * m_ptrs;
00076         UINT8 *  m_recnos;
00077 };
00078 
00080 
00081 #endif //#if defined(APOXI_ENABLE_USIM_PHONEBOOK)
00082 
00083 #endif
